strapiPost.title: NWA Tech Summit Back In-Person and Fast Approaching
strapiPost.content:
Get ready to hear about all of the supply chain innovation, health & wellness startups, and adoption of Web3 at the Northwest Arkansas Technology Summit in October.

  • Huge in the Heartland: According to NWA Tech Summit's director, this conference is the biggest of its kind in the Heartland. In 2019, the last in-person version of the summit, 1,400 participants flocked to the conference. Even when it was held virtually, there were around 1,200 participants in both 2020 and 2021.
  • Show and tell: In its in-person format this year, participants will get to be fully immersed in great tech. Director, Kris Adams says "If you have something flashy and exciting and fun that you can show us...that's what we want to have at the Tech Summit this year."

If you're interested in attending, you can learn more and sign up HERE. You can also listen to The Bentonville Beacon's episode with Kris to learn more HERE.
